page.title: 20BALLYMENA GOLF CLUB
page.content: Ballymena Golf Club which is situated on the main Broughshane to Ballymena Road was founded in 1903.At present it has seven hundred and sixty members and is expanding every year.The current membership fee is Â£105+V.A.T. per. annum. The club is open every day,all day, right through the year and enters the following competitions: Barton Shield, Senior Cup, Junior Cup, Ulster Cup, Fred Daly Trophy and Carlesberg Trophy. The running of the club is looked after by a committee which is split into various sub-committees. The club also raises money by holding various social functions in its club house.
